mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.redpacket_id AS "redpacketId", a.redpacket_name AS "redpacketName", a.user_id AS "userid", a.user_name AS "userName", a.redpacket_price AS "redpacketPrice", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.redpacket_type AS "redpacketType", a.discount_ratio AS "discountRatio", a.in_use as "inUse"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u4 ON u4.id = a.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_redpacket_relaction( id, redpacket_id, redpacket_name, user_id, user_name, redpacket_price, create_time, redpacket_type, discount_ratio, in_use ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{redpacketId}, #{redpacketName}, #{userid}, #{userName}, #{redpacketPrice}, #{createTime}, #{redpacketType}, #{discountRatio}, #{inUse} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user_redpacket_relaction SET redpacket_id = #{redpacketId}, redpacket_name = #{redpacketName}, user_id = #{userid}, user_name = #{userName}, redpacket_price = #{redpacketPrice}, create_time = #{createTime}, redpacket_type = #{redpacketType}, discount_ratio = #{discountRatio}, in_use=#{inUse} WHERE id = #{id}
